text: @realDonaldTrump FAKE PRESIDENT WHO IS A LYING COWARD. Your destroying AMERICA PRESIDENT Obama left you with in great shape. How many more Americans would be alive you got off your butt and handled Covid-19 instead of calling it a hoax. Well DUDE it's not a HOAX!!
